ygData.subject: Erudin Necro Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: That s good!  Hire people to do their shopping.  All my friends are in the human territories unforunately, and I am stuck in Erudin.  I did take the boat from
ygData.messageBody:
That's good! Hire people to do their shopping. All my friends are in
the human territories unforunately, and I am stuck in Erudin. I did
take the boat from Erudin to Quetos (however you spell it) but they
killed as soon as I got off the boat instantly. It was quite nerve
wracking.

I'm going to try to meet up with them again, but I've gotta be quick
and get heck outta Quetos real fast..as soon as I land without runing
into NPCs.

Are there and Erudin Necros here? I'd just like to discuss a few
tips, like where do you get water from in Erudin? I'm gonna hopefully
talk to one of the wizards around there to pick up a fishing rod for
me, so food is not going to be a problem soon I hope.

Problem with Erudin (hopefully there are some from Erudin here) it
doesn't seem too busy. There's like an average of 6 - 8 people on the
Veeshan server. They are all wizards, so getting a nicely mixed party
together is impossible.

===
,,
Shaithis
,,
